description: Source file for the NoteService class, which provides business logic for managing notes including create, update, list, get, and delete operations.
external_methods: repository.update(Long id, String title, String content)

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service class providing CRUD operations for notes, interfacing with the repository.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note from the provided request data.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id, using data from the request.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all notes.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by id, if it exists.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by id, returning true if successful.
